mapper.select: SELECT id, label_id, tag, color, bg, border_color, deleted, user_id FROM t_new_posts_tag WHERE label_id = #{labelId} AND (deleted IS NULL OR deleted = 0) LIMIT 1
SELECT id, label_id, tag, color, bg, border_color, deleted, user_id FROM t_new_posts_tag WHERE (deleted IS NULL OR deleted = 0)

SELECT t_new_posts_tag_relation.id, t_new_posts_tag_relation.post_id, t_new_posts_tag_relation.tag_id, t_new_posts_tag_relation.deleted, t_new_posts_tag.tag, t_new_posts_tag.color, t_new_posts_tag.bg, t_new_posts_tag.border_color, t_new_posts_tag.user_id FROM t_new_posts_tag_relation LEFT JOIN t_new_posts_tag ON t_new_posts_tag.id = t_new_posts_tag_relation.tag_id WHERE (t_new_posts_tag_relation.deleted IS NULL OR t_new_posts_tag_relation.deleted = 0) AND (t_new_posts_tag.deleted IS NULL OR t_new_posts_tag.deleted = 0)

SELECT pt.id, pt.label_id, pt.tag, pt.color, pt.bg, pt.border_color, pt.deleted, pt.user_id FROM t_new_posts_tag pt INNER JOIN t_new_posts_tag_relation ptr ON pt.id = ptr.tag_id WHERE ptr.post_id = #{postId} AND (ptr.deleted IS NULL OR ptr.deleted = 0) AND (pt.deleted IS NULL OR pt.deleted = 0)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_new_posts_tag_relation (post_id, tag_id, deleted) VALUES (#{postId}, #{tagId}, 0)
